markdownPage.header_excerpt: We're going back to the original vision of the Internet - By the people, for the people. With industry-transforming technology. And we are already live today.

cards.excerpt: You can help build the new inter-net infrastructure. Farmers connect capacity + compute. All you need is electricity + network + 3node. Link to solution. Get rewarded with tokens. Users reserve

cards.title: The Market

cards.excerpt: The Cloud is the engine for the current internet. To change the behaviour of the internet we need a new engine. Estimated cloud revenue 2027 = 1.1 trillion. 200 billion revenue for SAAS cloud. 4
